tierOne.choiceOne: Amp up Security: 6 Might -> Move to Tier Two and Add 4 to Chaos
tierOne.choiceTwo: Establish Surveillance: 3 Smarts + 3 Moxie -> Move to Tier Two and Add 4 to Mafia Presence.

tierTwo.crimeEffect: Chaos goes up by one every turn.
tierTwo.choiceOne: Shake Down Informants: 6 Muscle + 5 Moxie -> Move to Tier Three and Add 4 to Police Corruption.
tierTwo.choiceTwo: Piece Together Evidence: 7 Smarts + 4 Moxie -> Move to Tier Three. Add 1 to each Crime Category.

tierThree.crimeEffect: Heist countdown begins, 15 turns until it reaches zero, if it does, the players lose.
tierThree.choiceOne: Heist in Progress! Rush the bank!: 8 Might + 5 Moxie. -> Move to tier four. Add 4 to chaos.
tierThree.choiceTwo: Heist in Progress! Set up a perimeter!: 10 Smarts. -> Move to tier four. Add 5 to Mafia Presence.

tierFour.crimeEffect: Countdown gains three counts (if the countdown was at 4 it’s now at 7) but continues down, and if it reaches zero the players lose. Each category goes up by one every turn.
tierFour.choiceOne: Hostage Situation! Call in a negotiator: 7 Smarts + 5 Moxie. -> Move to tier five. Add 6 to Police Corruption.
tierFour.choiceTwo: Hostage Situation! Take the shot: 9 Moxie + 4 Might. -> Move to tier five. Add 6 to Chaos.

tierFive.crimeEffect: Countdown gains five counts, but still continues to countdown. Each category goes up by two each turn.
tierFive.choiceFinal: Stop the Getaway!: 30 points total from the stat pools. -> Players win.

tierOne.choiceOne: Bombs strapped to support pillars! Evacuate!: 2 Might + 2 Moxie -> Move to Tier Two and Add 2 to Chaos
tierOne.choiceTwo: Bombs strapped to support pillars! Diffuse!: 6 Smarts -> Move to Tier Two and subtract 1 to Chaos.

tierTwo.choiceOne: Downtown Under Attack! Rush in!: 7 Muscle + 6 Moxie -> Move to Tier Three and Add 1 to Chaos.
tierTwo.choiceTwo: Downtown Under Attack! Keep a level head, secure a perimeter: 10 Smarts + 5 Moxie -> Move to Tier Three. Subtract 2 to Chaos.

tierThree.crimeEffect: Lasts three turns, Chaos increases by 1 every turn. Can only pick one of the two choices once over the period of the three turns.
tierThree.choiceOne: Calm before the storm. Investigate Biers: 8 Smarts + 3 Moxie. -> Decrease cost of tier four choices by 3 Moxie.
tierThree.choiceTwo: Calm Before the Storm. Prepare: 5 Smarts + 2 Might. -> Subtract 2 to Chaos.

tierFour.crimeEffect: Chaos increases by 3. Chaos increases by 1 every turn.
tierFour.choiceOne: Siege on Stony Gate! Sneak in: 10 Smarts + 7 Moxie. -> Move to tier five. Add 2 to Chaos.
tierFour.choiceTwo: Siege on Stony Gate! Guns Blazing!: 6 Moxie + 4 Might. -> Move to tier five. Add 5 to Chaos.

tierFive.choiceFinal: Stop the Assassination!: 15 total of Might and/or Smarts + 15 Moxie. -> Players win.

tierOne.choiceOne: There’s something happening here… Investigate nearby housing: 4 Smarts -> Move to Tier Two. Add 2 Police Corruption.
tierOne.choiceTwo: There’s something happening here... Investigate rumors circulating among the populace: 2 Smarts + 2 Moxie -> Move to Tier Two and Add 4 to Mafia Presence.

tierTwo.choiceOne: What it is ain’t exactly clear... Get a warrant to search certain suspects: 6 Moxie + 4 Smarts -> Move to Tier Three and Add 2 Mafia Presence.
tierTwo.choiceTwo: What it is ain’t exactly clear...Capture new recruits: 10 Might + 2 Moxie -> Move to Tier Three. Subtract 1 to Mafia Presence, add 2 to Police Corruption.

tierThree.choiceOne: There’s a man with a gun over there... Storm the compounds: 12 Might. -> Move to tier four. Add 4 to chaos and subtract 3 from mafia presence.
tierThree.choiceTwo: There’s a man with a gun over there… Send in a double agent: 5 Smarts and 5 Moxie. -> Move to tier four. Add 2 to Mafia Presence.

tierFour.crimeEffect: Mafia presence increases by 1 every turn.
tierFour.choiceOne: Telling me I got to beware... Firefight: 8 Moxie + 8 Might. -> Move to tier five. Add 2 to Chaos subtract 3 from mafia presence.
tierFour.choiceTwo: Telling me I got to beware... Gather evidence: 6 Moxie + 5 Smarts. -> Move to tier five. Add 3 to Mafia presence but for the final choice you can spend 15 might instead of twenty.

tierFive.crimeEffect: Mafia presence and chaos increases by 1 every turn.
tierFive.choiceFinal: Stop! Hey! What’s that sound!: 20 (15 if choice two was picked for tier four) might total from the stat pools. → Players win.
